body.p: Franklin, Kentucky, Commonwealth's Attorney. Barren County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Jones and Mary Young Jones. Married Mary P. Lewis Jones on May 10, 1838. Father of Virgil A. Jones, Elenora I. Jones, Eugenia A. Jones, and John N. T. Jones. Married Mary A. Mann Jones on April 14, 1846. Father of James S. Jones, Harriet B. Jones, Elizabeth Jones, and William O. Jones. Studied law under Franklin Gorin in Glasgow, Kentucky. Practiced law in Glasgow in 1837. Member of the Masonic fraternity after 1848. Practiced law in Franklin. Enslaved five people in 1850. Commonwealth's Attorney of the 4th Judicial District from 1858 to 1866. Simpson County, Kentucky, resident in 1860.
